concept.title: Shutting Down a System with Disk Stores
concept.shortdesc: Use the gfsh shutdown command to shut down a system with disk stores.

section.p:
To shut down the system:
Have all members with persistent disk stores running, if possible.
Shut down all members together using the gfsh command-line tool: shutdown
You must be connected to the distributed system in gfsh to execute this command.
